references.paper_title: Differential equations driven by rough paths
references.reason: This paper is foundational to the Rough Path Theory, which is the theoretical underpinning of the Rough Transformer.
This paper introduced Neural ODEs, a key inspiration for the Rough Transformer's continuous-time approach.
This paper introduced the Transformer architecture, which is the basis of the Rough Transformer model.

references.paper_title: Neural controlled differential equations for irregular time series
references.reason: This paper extended Neural ODEs to handle irregular time series, addressing a key challenge in real-world data which is also tackled by the Rough Transformer.

references.paper_title: Neural rough differential equations for long time series
references.reason: This paper further developed Neural ODE methods for long time series, a problem addressed more efficiently by the Rough Transformer
